name: HIPAA: De-Classify PHI
instructions:
Follow this checklist published by HHS.gov to take Protected Health Information out of HIPAA scope.  

Reference: https://www.hhs.gov/hipaa/for-professionals/privacy/special-topics/de-identification/index.html#protected

name: HIPAA Compliance: NIST 800-66 4.1-4.22 Combined Evaluation
instructions:
Considerations when applying the HIPAA security rule.

Complete the following sections to evaluate compliance with HIPAA standards, based on NIST 800-66.

From: NIST Publications

name: Incident Response Contacts and Initial Documentation
instructions:
Use this checklist in the event of an IT incident, data breach or suspected breach.

Reference: https://csrc.nist.gov/publications/detail/sp/800-61/rev-2/final

name: OWASP Top 10 Self Audit
instructions: Review your recent code for OWASP Top 10 potential vulnerabilities. Document any you find so they can be worked on. Not everyone has control over all of these items, and you may not be able to verify some. In such a case, choose "unable to verify."

name: Dev System Credentials
instructions:
Used to track systems a new developer must be added to, and a departing developer removed from.

Some are optional.

name: COVID-19 Office Questionnaire
instructions: Use this as a checklist for people who want to visit the premises when a contagious disease is going around. Any "yes" answer may require additional information and/or a delayed visit.

name: Workplace Safety Audit
instructions: Perform this workplace safety check periodically to identify safety issues.
